item.title: Syllabus
item.description: This is a tentative schedule and will change. Week 1 - August 26, 28, 30 - Introduction, Network terminologies, Architecture vs Protocols September 2 - Labor day, no class Week 2 - September 4, 6 - Connecting machines, Reliable Delivery, Ethernet, Access protocols September 8 - Last date to drop class Week 3 - September 9, 11, 13 - Packet Switching September 15 - Project 1 Due Week 4 - September 18, 20, 23 - Internetworking, Transport Protocol
